00317 class async_client : public virtual iasync_client
00318 {
00319 public:
00321     typedef std::shared_ptr<async_client> ptr_t;
00322 
00323 private:
00325     typedef std::unique_lock<std::mutex> guard;
00326 
00328     mutable std::mutex lock_;
00330     MQTTAsync cli_;
00332     std::string serverURI_;
00334     std::string clientId_;
00336     MQTTClient_persistence* persist_;
00338     callback* userCallback_;
00340     std::list<itoken_ptr> pendingTokens_;
00342     std::list<idelivery_token_ptr> pendingDeliveryTokens_;
00343 
00344     static void on_connection_lost(void *context, char *cause);
00345     static int on_message_arrived(void* context, char* topicName, int topicLen, 
00346                                   MQTTAsync_message* msg);
00347     static void on_delivery_complete(void* context, MQTTAsync_token tok);
00348 
00350     friend class token;
00351     virtual void add_token(itoken_ptr tok);
00352     virtual void add_token(idelivery_token_ptr tok);
00353     virtual void remove_token(itoken* tok);
00354     virtual void remove_token(itoken_ptr tok) { remove_token(tok.get()); }
00355     void remove_token(idelivery_token_ptr tok) { remove_token(tok.get()); }
00356 
00358     std::vector<char*> alloc_topic_filters(
00359                             const topic_filter_collection& topicFilters);
00360     void free_topic_filters(std::vector<char*>& filts);
00361 
00366     callback* get_callback() const {
00367         guard g(lock_);
00368         return userCallback_;
00369     }
00370 
00372     async_client() =delete;
00373     async_client(const async_client&) =delete;
00374     async_client& operator=(const async_client&) =delete;
00375

00394                  const std::string& persistDir);

00406                  iclient_persistence* persistence);

00425     virtual itoken_ptr connect(connect_options options) throw(exception, security_exception);

00436                                iaction_listener& cb) throw(exception, security_exception);

00447                             throw(exception, security_exception);
00452     virtual itoken_ptr disconnect() throw(exception) { return disconnect(0L); }

00469                         throw(exception);

00477         return disconnect(0L, userContext, cb);
00478     }
00483     virtual idelivery_token_ptr get_pending_delivery_token(int msgID) const;
00488     virtual std::vector<idelivery_token_ptr> get_pending_delivery_tokens() const;
00493     virtual std::string get_client_id() const { return clientId_; }
00497     virtual std::string get_server_uri() const { return serverURI_; }
00501     virtual bool is_connected() const { return MQTTAsync_isConnected(cli_) != 0; }

00512                                         size_t n, int qos, bool retained) throw(exception);

00525                                         const void* payload, size_t n,
